Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are rerouted  via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Irving Park to Fullerton
ShortDescription: SB 9 Ashland rr via Ashland, Lawrence, Marine Dr, In Lake Shore, Sheridan, Cannon, Fullerton, O Lake Shore & norm rt due to blockage from Irving Pk to Fullerton

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Lawrence, Marine Drive, Inner Lake Shore Drive, Sheridan, Cannon, Fullerton, Outer Lake Shore Drive, then resume their normal route due to street blockage between Irving Park and Fullerton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem- bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at King Drive. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem- bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at King Drive.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
